# denyInAppPurchases

**Type Property**

The metadata associated with the setting to deny in-app purchases.

## Declaration

```swift
static let denyInAppPurchases: SettingMetadata<Bool>
```

## Discussion

Use `denyInAppPurchases` to access metadata about [doc://com.apple.ManagedSettings/documentation/ManagedSettings/AppStoreSettings/denyInAppPurchases-swift.property]. The default value is `false`.

## Denying In-App Purchases

- **denyInAppPurchases**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to deny the user permission to make in-app purchases.
